miniApp.name: FortuneCookieCaster
miniApp.description: Discover your cosmic destiny with interactive fortune cookies! Break open beautiful 3D fortune cookies to reveal mystical messages and share them with your Farcaster community.

screenshots.alt: Fortune Caster main interface with floating fortune cookie
Opened fortune cookie revealing mystical message

miniApp.tagline: Break open fortune cookies to reveal your destiny
miniApp.ogTitle: Fortune Cookie Caster - Discover Your Destiny
miniApp.ogDescription: Break open beautiful 3D fortune cookies to reveal mystical messages and share them with your Farcaster community.
